about_the_game:
It's not the same as usual

Here is a man who has grown tired of the same monotonous days.
His dream is to become wealthy and leave behind his life as a regular office worker.
But one day, an unexpected opportunity comes his way after he gets off work.

Is it truly an opportunity, or something else?
Escape your endlessly looping room by passing through the mirror.

Feature

  • After work, face the seven obstacles that stand in your way.

  • Lure specific monsters by whistling 'H' and burping 'R' keys

  • Escape so the monsters can't catch you.

  • Remove all obstacles to achieve your dream

  • The picture frame in the room will show the number of obstacles you have overcome.

name: Get off Work

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core i5 Porcessor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris HD5200 pro or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core i5 Porcessor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris HD5200 pro or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: After coming home from work, the usual atmosphere is different. Suddenly, someone appears and starts giving you terrifying and strange tasks.
